header.title: Emigration & working abroad
header.subtitle: Support for South Africans and residents who want to move abroad, work internationally or apply for study programmes overseas.

fromSa.title: Emigrating from South Africa
fromSa.body: We assist individuals and families who are planning to change their main country of residence and start a new chapter abroad.

points.0: Clarifying country-specific visa routes and options
points.1: Guidance on documents, timing and expectations
points.2: Practical advice on planning your relocation

workStudy.title: Work & study visas
workStudy.body: We help you understand which work or study pathways match your profile and long-term plans.

points.0: Initial assessment of your chances and options
points.1: Guidance on choosing suitable programmes or employers
points.2: Support with preparing documentation for applications

touristTraining.title: Tourist & training visas
touristTraining.body: Guidance for clients applying for short-term tourist or training visas to the USA, Canada, Europe and the UK.

points.0: Tourist visa preparation and basic document check
points.2: Support with appointments and embassy / consulate requirements

greece.title: Greece: visa-free access & opportunities
greece.body: Greece offers convenient access to the EU, with visa-free travel for Greek citizens and practical benefits for those who hold or plan to obtain Greek documents.

pills.0: Up to 90 days visa-free travel in the EU
pills.1: Remote passport services in many cases
